lightning_announcements.name: THOR Red Alert
lightning_announcements.description: THOR system red alert - highest lightning danger
lightning_announcements.tts_text: THOR RED ALERT: Extreme lightning danger detected. All personnel must take immediate shelter. Suspend all outdoor activities immediately.

lightning_announcements.name: THOR Warning
lightning_announcements.description: THOR system warning - elevated lightning risk
lightning_announcements.tts_text: THOR Warning: Lightning activity detected by monitoring system. Exercise caution and be prepared to seek shelter.

lightning_announcements.name: THOR All Clear
lightning_announcements.description: THOR system all clear - lightning threat reduced
lightning_announcements.tts_text: THOR All Clear: Lightning threat has diminished. Normal operations may resume with continued monitoring.

lightning_announcements.name: THOR Unknown Status
lightning_announcements.description: THOR system unknown status - system connectivity issue
lightning_announcements.tts_text: THOR System Alert: Lightning monitoring system status unknown. Exercise extreme caution until system connectivity is restored.

safety_notes: Lightning can strike up to 10 miles away from a thunderstorm
The 30-30 rule: Seek shelter when thunder follows lightning by 30 seconds or less, stay sheltered for 30 minutes after last thunder
Avoid elevated areas, metal objects, and electronic equipment during lightning activity
